Title: Requires sellers to disclose to purchasers whether property is located within a half mile of a superfund site
Summary: Requires sellers to provide a written disclosure to purchasers stating whether property is located within a half mile of a superfund site and requires such notice to be signed by both the seller and the purchaser and attached to the contract of sale or exchange.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to disclosure of real property located within a half mile of a superfund site
